content: standing pencil case/hook case materials  worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver in turquoise  3 5 mm hook  3/4 button gauge  gauge isn t important for this pattern my finished product is about 6½ tall and 1¾ in diameter you can adjust to preferred measurements case row 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 row 2 2 single_crochet in each st 12 row 3 2 single_crochet in each st 24 row 4 *3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st* 30 row 5 single_crochet in back look only around 30 row 6 *decrease single_crochet in next 13* 28 row 7-36 single_crochet in each st around 28 finish off by slip_stitch into next st and weave in tails top row 1-6 repeat from above case row 7-9 single_crochet in each st around 28 attaching step 1 slip_stitch through front loop of top and back loop of case half way around 14 step 2 slip_stitch through front and back loops of next 7 sts of top step 3 sew button to case directly below end of current slip_stitch on top piece place button between row 31 and 32 of case step 4 chain 10 or however many to snugly fit around your button and slip_stitch into same st of top step 5 slip_stitch through remaining 7 sts of top finish off and weave in tail optional needle holder using worsted weight yarn picture shows red heart super saver white and 2 5mm hook row 1 chain 10 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across 9 row 2-9 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 9 10 chain 1 turn single_crochet across and continue to single_crochet around remaining 3 sides of holder finish off leaving at least 12 tail whipstitch onto case in desired area ©margo swanson all rights reserved you may use this pattern for personal use as a gift or for charity but please do not sell this pattern for financial gain please feel free to link this pattern but please do not rewrite on any personal pages if you have any questions or comments feel free to email me at margolswanson@gmail com or leave a comment on ravelry
